name: Raveena
greetingText: Just wanted to take a moment to say... HAPPY BIRTHDAY!! 🎉🎂
wishText: May life bless you with happiness, success, and all the love your heart desires. 💫
textInChatBox: You’re a very strong person, Raveena
text2: I was going to send a simple birthday text...
text5Content: You are Best Friend to me
outroText: Now go enjoy your day, have lots of cake 🍰, and make the most wonderful memories!
replayText: And hey, don’t forget to Take Care of Yourself
